name: darkblack.vim
summary: A black background color scheme based on darkblue.
description:
Darkblack is an alteration to the darkblue colorscheme by Bohdan Vlasyuk.
It provides a black background and fonts with light colors to keep them visible.

Design for gui, but should look good on cterm as well.
install_details:
Add to colors directory and run ":colorscheme darkblack"

Run dos2unix on darkblack.vim if vim gives the message "E492: Not an editor command: ^M"
